parsetree.*:
<root><template><title>RV</title><part><name>type</name>=<value>command

</value></part><part><name index="1"/><value> ofp

</value></part><part><name index="2"/><value>1.00

</value></part><part><name>arg</name>=<value> local

</value></part><part><name>eff</name>=<value> local

</value></part><part><name>gr1</name>=<value> Waypoints

</value></part><part><name index="3"/><value> Disable switching to next waypoint (current waypoint will never complete while lockwp is used). Sometimes used during cut-scenes.

</value></part><part><name index="4"/><value> groupName '''lockWP''' lock

</value></part><part><name>p1</name>=<value> groupName: [[Object]] or [[Group]]

</value></part><part><name>p2</name>=<value> lock: [[Boolean]]

</value></part><part><name index="5"/><value> [[Nothing]]
		  
</value></part><part><name>x1</name>=<value> <code>_groupOne '''lockWP''' [[true]];</code>
</value></part><part><name>x2</name>=<value> <code>_Soldier '''lockWP''' [[true]];</code>
</value></part><part><name>x3</name>=<value> <code>_MyTank '''lockWP''' [[false]];</code>

</value></part><part><name>seealso</name>=<value> [[waypoints]], [[deleteWaypoint]], [[copyWaypoints]], [[setCurrentWaypoint]], [[setWaypointBehaviour]], [[setWaypointCombatMode]], [[setWaypointCompletionRadius]], [[setWaypointFormation]], [[setWaypointHousePosition]], [[setWaypointPosition]], [[setWaypointScript]], [[setWaypointSpeed]], [[setWaypointStatements]], [[setWaypointTimeout]], [[setWaypointType]], [[setWaypointVisible]], [[waypointAttachVehicle]], [[waypointAttachedVehicle]], [[setWaypointLoiterRadius]], [[waypointLoiterRadius]], [[addWaypoint]], [[setWaypointLoiterType]], [[waypointSpeed]]
</value></part></template>
